ModMetaData.name: ED-OmniGel
ModMetaData.author: Jaxxa
ModMetaData.description:
Version: 0.18.0.0 Discussion, Non Steam Downloads and Source of this mod is available at: https://ludeon.com/forums/index.php?topic=37158
Adds Omnigel into the game. Allows you to grow a new resource and refine it into resources such as stone or metal.
Recipes:
The following are the resources that are available from the various levels of the replicator.
MK1: 10 OmniGel -> 1 ChunkSlag 10 OmniGel -> 1 ChunkRock
MK2: 40 OmniGel -> 20 Steel 40 OmniGel -> 30 Silver 30 OmniGel -> 3 Gold
MK3: 60 OmniGel -> 4 Plasteel 60 OmniGel -> 10 Uranium 50 OmniGel -> 10 Jade
40 OmniGel -> 2 Medicine 40 OmniGel + 4 Medicine -> 1 GlitterworldMedicine
